TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(object sender, WebPartConnectionsEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartConnectionsEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartConnectionsEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartConnectionsEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartConnectionsEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartConnectionsEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: 表示方法，處理 控制項的 和 事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler>類別會定義兩個所發生的事件處理常式委派<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項：<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>事件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>事件。 處理的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>事件是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>方法。 處理的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>事件是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A>方法。 這兩種情況下，事件資料會包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs>物件。
